alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Madison; Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 8:05PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN FRANKLIN, NORTHWESTERN PICKAWAY AND SOUTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM EDT... At 805 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Mount Sterling, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Grove City, Grandview Heights, Obetz, Commercial Point, Urbancrest, Valleyview, Harrisburg, Orient, Lockbourne, Derby, Georgesville, Darbydale, Big Plain, Wrightsville and Lincoln Village. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 96 and 98. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 86 and 104. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
